body:
/kind bug

**What happened**: apiserver returns InternalError for `kubectl exec` when ValidatingWebhookConfiguration matches pods/exec resource.

**What you expected to happen**: Webhook should be invoked and admission control decision should be enforced on CONNECT operation

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

```
# Create a pod to connect to
$ kubectl create -f nginx-pod.yml
```

```
# Verify that exec works BEFORE creating ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
$ kubectl exec -it nginx hostname
nginx
```

```
# Create ValidatingWebhookConfiguration that matches pods/exec resource
$ cat webhook-registration.yaml
kind: ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1beta1
metadata:
  name: webhook
webhooks:
  - name: webhook.example.com
    rules:
      - operations: ["CONNECT"]
        apiGroups: ["*"]
        apiVersions: ["*"]
        resources: ["pods/exec"]
    clientConfig:
      service:
        namespace: foo
        name: bar
      caBundle: 

$ kubectl create -f webhook-registration.yaml
validatingwebhookconfiguration "webhook" created
```

```
# Try to exec into container AFTER creating ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
$ kubectl exec -it nginx hostname
Error from server (InternalError): Internal error occurred: converting (rest.ConnectRequest) to (v1.Pod): TypeMeta not present in src
```

**Environment**:

```
$ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.3", GitCommit:"f0efb3cb883751c5ffdbe6d515f3cb4fbe7b7acd", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-08T18:39:33Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"", Minor:"", GitVersion:"v1.9.0", GitCommit:"925c127ec6b946659ad0fd596fa959be43f0cc05", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-01-26T19:04:38Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

Tested on minikube v0.25

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: kubectl exec fails when ValidatingWebhookConfiguration matches pods/exec resource
